Professional, friendly, and knowledgeable. Maria put me at ease right away and proceeded to totally rock the procedure. My brows are amazing Totally recommend.

Maria is the absolute best at what she does! She is so good at explaining every single step during the mirco blading process and what to expect afterwards! She free hands everything and it's just amazing to me how good my brows look! I'm obsessed. Can't wait to go back and see her!
